data.name: HUMANKIND™ - Digital Deluxe Upgrade
data.detailed_description:
Get more of HUMANKIND™ with the Digital Deluxe Upgrade, featuring:
• HUMANKIND™ - Notre-Dame Pack
• HUMANKIND™ - digital soundtrack (.mp3)
• HUMANKIND™ - Unit & Tech tree poster (.pdf)
• A exclusive Badge on Games2Gether

The HUMANKIND™ - Notre-Dame Pack includes:
• Victor Hugo Avatar Set
• Notre-Dame Wonder
• Notre-Dame Narrative Events
• Inspirational Avatar Personality

data.short_description: Get more of HUMANKIND™ with the Digital Deluxe Upgrade, featuring: • HUMANKIND™ - Notre-Dame Pack • HUMANKIND™ - digital soundtrack (.mp3) • HUMANKIND™ - Unit & Tech tree poster (.pdf) • A exclusive Badge on Games2Gether The HUMANKIND™ - Notre-Dame Pack includes: • Victor Hugo Avatar Set • Notre-Dame Wonder • Notre-Dame Narrative...
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 4th generation / AMD FX-8300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 770 / AMD R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 6th generation (or better) / AMD Ryzen 5 1600 (or better)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 (or better) / AMD RX 5500-XT (or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.13 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.7Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon460 4GB or Intel(R) Iris(TM) Plus Graphics
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires an Intel-based 64-bit processor (Not compatible with Apple M1)
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
